backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling hash-based routing and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Netlify-compatible contact form handling user input and submission.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeAccent: Component rendering themed background accent layers based on a variant prop.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple branded footer with gradient background and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive sticky navigation bar with brand styling and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable service card with icon, title, description, and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsConte: React component that renders the structured Why Choose Us content with headings, paragraphs, and bullet lists.
frontend/src/content/dreamonomyCopy.ts: Centralized marketing copy object containing brand text, homepage sections, and service descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context and provider handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining brand color variables, dark mode themes, and component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, providing React Query and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/AboutWhyPage.tsx: Page rendering the About/Why content using dreamonomyCopy, including hero, story, and philosophy sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with a hero section, introductory text from dreamonomyCopy, and a ContactForm component with decorative accents.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage hero, CTA, rotating logo, mapped service icons, and services section content using dreamonomyCopy and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays the services hero and multiple services sections driven by dreamonomyCopy, including subjects, approaches, and styled content blocks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme utilities for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks the siteâ€™s update state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for replacing placeholder content with user-provided DREAMONOMY text.
